import React, { Component } from 'react' import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button' import Modal from '../popups/modal' import CameraItem from './cameraItem' class configurationBoard extends Component { state = { showCameraModal: false, showContactsModal: false } handleCameraModal = () => { let currentCamState = this.state.showCameraModal this.setState({showCameraModal: !currentCamState}) } handleContactModal = () => { let currentCamState = this.state.showContactsModal this.setState({showContactsModal: !currentCamState}) } render(){ return(

Configuration
)} } export default configurationBoard
